name: Samsung Reviews API
description: This API displays all the data of the Samsung Galaxy s7 reviews, that are scraped from verizon wireless website. You can do get,post,put and delete functions with this API.

requests.name: http://www.dineshpaladhi.com:5000/data?Username=Dinesh
requests.description: This is a "DELETE request. Here i can send any object parameters as the URI parameters and have them deleted from the database.

requests.name: http://www.dineshpaladhi.com:5000/data
requests.description: This is a "GET" request which displays all the 6000 plus reviews from that have been scraped and stored in mongoDB.

requests.name: http://www.dineshpaladhi.com:5000/data/count
requests.description: This is again a "GET" request which gives you the count of the objects in the database.

requests.name: http://www.dineshpaladhi.com:5000/data
requests.description:
This is a "PUT" request which updates any records from the database. 
The query object should contain which object to update and the update object should contain what it should be updated to. 
All this data should be sent as a json object in the body. 
Here I am updating the Username to "Dinesh Kumar Paladhi"

requests.name: http://www.dineshpaladhi.com:5000/data
requests.description: This is a "POST" request. Here I can inserted as many objects as you like with any structure. This objects that should be inserted should be send throught the body in json format as the list of objects.
